skuInfo.name: Mag M SS Laguna Madre:Grey:X Small
skuInfo.longDescription: Just slip on the Magellan Outdoors Men's Laguna Madre Solid Short Sleeve Fishing Shirt, pack up your reel, rod and tackle box and you'll be ready to go. Made of lightweight, yet sturdy nylon, this short-sleeve shirt offers UPF 20+ protection from the sun's harmful rays. Plus, moisture-wicking fabric technology helps keep you cool and dry on especially hot days out on the water.
skuInfo.imageAltDescription: Mag M SS Laguna Madre:Grey:X Small
